description: Project for the phase out of Ozone Depleting Substance under the Montreal Protocol Phase VI

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Strengthening of Ozone Cell at Ministry of Environment & Forests for coorodination of Montreal Protocol activities in India.  Ministry of Environment and Forests will also form the regulatory measures for the phase-out activities.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Phase out of Ozone Depleting
